title: Organic semiconductor nanoparticles for visible-light-driven CO2 conversion
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00196F, Communication
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mariia Ferree, Jan Kosco, Nisreen Alshehri, Lingyun Zhao, Catherine De Castro, Petoukhoff Christopher, Iain McCulloch, Martin Heeney, Frédéric Laquai
We present an experimental proof-of-concept study of organic semiconductor nanoparticles (NPs) for visible-light-driven carbon dioxide (CO2) conversion. Donor:acceptor NPs, consisting of the conjugated polymer donor PM6 and small molecule electron...
